projects.name: NASA RMC Lunar Rover
projects.desc: Team lead and excavation subsystem engineer for the Stevens NASA Robotic Mining Competition team, wherein we competed with 50 other university teams to design and build a lunar rover

projects.name: Micro Mecanum Robot
projects.desc: A fully custom, 3D-printed mecanum wheel-based mobile robot build to experiment with computuer vision and autonomous robotics

projects.name: Combat Robotics (Robot Battles)
projects.desc: My entry into the 30lb (featherweight) combat robotics competition 'Robot Battles'. Fully cutsom designed in CAD, fabricated from 1/4-inch 6061 aluminum
